section.heading: Scope of subchapter.

para.text: This subchapter provides for the issuance of a basic business license to a business located in the District.
Notwithstanding whether an individual's employer maintains a basic business license, an individual may be subject to professional and occupational licensure under subchapter I-B of this chapter.
The issuance of a basic business license does not guarantee the registration of a trade name under subchapter I-C of this chapter.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-333: § 9 of D.C. Law 24-333 provided that the creation of this section by § 5(c)(2) of D.C. Law 24-333 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7286 of D.C. Law 25-217 provided that the amendments made to this section by Section 5(c)(2) of D.C. Law 24-333 shall apply as of October 1, 2025. Therefore those amendments have been implemented.

Section 7286 of D.C. Law 25-217 provided that the amendments made to this section by Section 5(c)(2) of D.C. Law 24-333 shall apply as of October 1, 2025. Therefore those amendments have been implemented.
Section 7286 of D.C. Law 25-217 amended section 9 of D.C. Law 24-333 making the creation of this section by section 5(c)(2) of D.C. Law 24-333 applicable as of October 1, 2025.
